desc: Medieval Fur sells legally and ethically trapped and poached animal fur, pelts and skins as well as bones and claws for medieval reenactors and esoteric enthusiasts. The best products & customer service from a Canadian Distributor. Coyote, Wolf, Fox, Bear and many more animal Furs.

layout.text:
Get the best real Furs, Skins and Drinking Horns
from an ethically sourced Canadian Merchant!
